title: Nurse: The True Story Of Mary Benjamin, R.N.
description: THE NATIONAL BESTSELLER-OVER TWO MILLION COPIES SOLD!A shocking, inspirational bestseller, Nurse is the story of eight weeks in the life of a nurse in a large urban hospital. It is all the joy and pain, the death and drama, the mistakes, successes, and secrets. Nurse reads like a novel, but sticks in the memory like real experience-because it is.
author: Peggy Anderson
